column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My wife and I ate here our first night in Chicago. We shouldn't have
column2: because it just set us up for disappointment the rest of the week. It was a special occasion
column3: so I sprung for the aged ribeye
column4: and it was perfectly done. My wife had a salad which she also thought was fantastic. Even the sweet potato we split was excellent.
